message.raw: Fixed whitespace. Clarified comments and fixed formatting of comments. Renamedi/clarified variables inarray and res to more descriptive names (input_array, downsampled_input_array). Added intermediate variable (resolution_partitioned_matrix) for when input_array is partitioned by the resolution, rather than replacing inarray.
message.html: Fixed whitespace. Clarified comments and fixed formatting of comments. Renamedi/clarified variables inarray and res to more descriptive names (input_array, downsampled_input_array). Added intermediate variable (resolution_partitioned_matrix) for when input_array is partitioned by the resolution, rather than replacing inarray.
